Description: Suffolk Construction and Emerson College agreed to pay $250,000 each in settlement of allegations they violated air pollution and asbestos regulations during renovation of Emerson's Colonial Building.

Info Source: Contained in a spreadsheet received from the agency on October 2, 2020 in response to an open records request. The spreadsheet included data from  the agency's Oculus database, which can be searched at https://prodenv.dep.state.fl.us/DepNexus/public/searchPortal
Notes: Case number is the designation given by the DEP's Office of General Counsel.

Agency: Massachusetts Executive Office of Energy and Environmental Affairs
Notes: Captured from records in EEA database with basic enforcement information; may not include full details of penalties.
